markdown_summary:
# Aeacus README 22.04.1

## Unique Identifier
Ensure to enter a valid Team ID to avoid VM malfunction.

## Forensics Questions
Scored questions are located on the Desktop; read thoroughly before modifying.

## Competition Scenario
- Password protected user accounts are required.
- Non-work related media and hacking tools are prohibited.
- The operating system must remain as 22.04.1; no upgrades are allowed.
- Authorized users must access via SSH and vsftpd.

## New User Creation
Create a new standard user account named "thirteen" with a chosen temporary password.
title: Aeacus README 22.04.1
